title: altr - my personal python package
details: A collection of snippets of code for solving problems bundled as python package that can be installed from github

title: Wordle game by Haskell
details: Implement the Wordle puzzle in Haskell language to explore functional programming style

title: Bias Correction of Multi-Dimensional Climate Data and Visualisation

Performed and evaluated performance of climate bias correction methods
